column1: (ok only kidding but he’s desperately saying anything to prove he’s one of them) are debating... wow it's hard to listen to and I can't believe anyone would want any of them to be President...#work/pray🇺🇸#Trump

Congressman Dan Meuser speaking at the PA AG GOP Meeting at Pennsylvania Farm Show. Also in attendance are Congressman G.T. Thompson PA GOP Chair Lawrence Tabas and AG GOP Chair Mike Firestine.  “What’s good for farmers is good for our country.” - Congressman Dan Meuser https://t.co/LHSCE3wZmD

The one fact that we do know is that Joe Biden pressured Ukraine to fire an AG that was investigating his son his son’s company who got an outrageous deal from a foreign country because his last name is Biden.

Thank you to the brave soldiers on D-Day and in WWII for saving the world from tyranny. Proud of our patriotic President Donald Trump for representing our country so effectively on this solemn yet inspiring day and on the entirety of his trip to Europe. #DDay75thAnniversary
